00070 
00071 /* flags for BM_edge_rotate */
00072 enum {
00073     BM_EDGEROT_CHECK_EXISTS     = (1 << 0), /* disallow to rotate when the new edge matches an existing one */
00074     BM_EDGEROT_CHECK_SPLICE     = (1 << 1), /* overrides existing check, if the edge already, rotate and merge them */
00075     BM_EDGEROT_CHECK_DEGENERATE = (1 << 2), /* disallow creating bow-tie, concave or zero area faces */
00076     BM_EDGEROT_CHECK_BEAUTY     = (1 << 3)  /* disallow to rotate into ugly topology */
00077 };
